name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
As a Senior Cybersecurity Engineer with 8 years of experience, I bring a robust skill set in **ISO 27001**, **ISO 42001**, **NIST**, **SOC 2**, **NIS2**, **CRA**, **IEC 62443**, and **OT Security**. I have a proven ability to design and implement compliance frameworks and governance policies, ensuring alignment with industry standards and regulatory requirements. My strong analytical skills allow me to develop effective risk management strategies tailored to organizational needs, while my relationship-building capabilities enhance collaboration with stakeholders across projects.

Additionally, I possess a background in full-stack development, leveraging expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** technologies, and have successfully built high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. My technical proficiency spans frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, coupled with cloud experience in **Azure** and **AWS**. I have also led the integration of AI/ML capabilities into enterprise-grade platforms, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** to enhance predictive analytics and intelligent automation. I am goal-driven and adaptable, able to deliver robust and secure applications while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS.
